title: "Google unveils Pixel 8 phones powered by new Tensor G3 chips"
excerpt: "With the new Tensor G3 chip, Google was able to roll out an upgrade to Magic Eraser on Pixel 8 Pro, which allows users to “erase” larger objects from their photos. Using this feature, users can select objects or people they consider distractions and have the AI remove them from the scene completely and it will replace them with background."
